ai-tha-ap312:2.1_0: The Buddha explained it to me.
ai-tha-ap312:2.3_0: It had a thousand panels, a thousand panels,
ai-tha-ap312:2.4_0: all adorned with banners, and made of gold.
ai-tha-ap312:3.3_0: gave the going forth and the carpets of dwellings,
ai-tha-ap312:3.4_0: I’ll rejoice in heaven for an eon.’
ai-tha-ap312:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mount Veḷiya.
ai-tha-ap312:7.1_0: ( for) the going-forth Elder Rohaṇa’s Cetiya
ai-tha-ap312:8.1_0: The thirty-two pieces of (precept) is the thirty-four.
ai-tha-ap312:10.2_0: but he perceives it as well.
